metadata.name: Freedom's Price
metadata.description:
Horror's not to be ignored, atrocities forever burned, a sacrifice made for an ideal. 'Freedom's Price' visually explores the inexplicable sacrifice made in the name of Freedom, a luxury enjoyed by those who have not seen the price it costs. For those who have, the scars are permanent, a constant reminder of the price paid for the greater good. Worth it in the name of honor, the internal devastation is softened but never forgotten.

Exhibition piece at Mecenate Fine Art - NFT gallery for the " AI is freedom " event.
